//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "jim", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "7 - HurryUp" );
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_ENEMY", "player" );

	task ( "aim" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Focus" );
	}

	dowait ( "aim" );
	set ( "SET_TASK", "Attack" );
	wait ( 3000.000 );
	set ( "SET_ATTACK", "OFF" );
}


affect ( "bubba", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "7 - HurryUp" );
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_ENEMY", "player" );

	task ( "aim" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Focus" );
	}

	dowait ( "aim" );
	set ( "SET_TASK", "Attack" );
	wait ( 3000.000 );
	set ( "SET_ATTACK", "OFF" );
}


if ( $alexigone$, $=$, $0.000$ )
{

	affect ( "aguard1", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "OFF" );
		set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "7 - HurryUp" );
		set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_ENEMY", "player" );

		task ( "aim" )
		{
			set ( "SET_TASK", "Focus" );
		}

		dowait ( "aim" );
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Attack" );
		wait ( 3000.000 );
		set ( "SET_ATTACK", "OFF" );
	}


	affect ( "aguard2", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "OFF" );
		set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "7 - HurryUp" );
		set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_ENEMY", "player" );

		task ( "aim" )
		{
			set ( "SET_TASK", "Focus" );
		}

		dowait ( "aim" );
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Attack" );
		wait ( 3000.000 );
		set ( "SET_ATTACK", "OFF" );
	}

}

wait ( 1000.000 );

affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
}
